summary: Experienced in data collection and analysis using statistical methods with familiarity in R and SAS programming; strong in experimental design, sampling techniques, and documents management; good communication, teamwork, and planning skills.

experience.title: Internship - Stock Prices Analyst
experience.description: Collect, enter and analyze stock prices; use R programming to analyze data; predict the future trend of different stocks using time series methods; write summary reports; perform customer service at the front desk; design questionnaires and solicit feedback.

experience.title: Internship
experience.description: Data collection and entry: collect financial data and classify them into correct tables and items; write summary reports with R; provide customer service; inventory control; arrange business trips (hotel booking, daily schedules) and monitor trip budgets.

experience.title: Internship
experience.description: Data collection and entering; write summary reports using statistics; provide customer service; meeting preparation; prepare documents for meetings, ensure participation, prepare PowerPoint slides and meeting room; introduce financial products to customers and persuade them to buy.
